1. Aries - 6/10 - Impulsive decisions can hinder success, but natural leadership and entrepreneurial spirit help.
2. Taurus - 4/10 - Pragmatic approach to finances might lead to short-term gains, but long-term investments suffer.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick thinking and adaptability make them thrive in fast-paced environments.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Emotional connection to work fuels motivation, but emotional instability can impact productivity.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Charisma and confidence drive success, but ego can sometimes cloud judgment.
6. Virgo - 3/10 - Attention to detail and critical thinking often lead to perfectionism, hindering progress.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic nature and strong social connections help navigate complex relationships.
8. Scorpio - 5/10 - Passion and intensity drive success, but tendency to hold grudges can create tension.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Optimistic outlook and adventurous spirit make them successful risk-takers.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Practical approach and strong work ethic drive career advancement, but caution can lead to missed opportunities.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Innovative thinking and humanitarian instincts help create positive change.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Empathetic nature and creative vision often get them ahead, but lack of boundaries can lead to burnout.
